name: Mindful Treasures
description:
A short interactive poetry game, you wake up in a cave and have to find the way out. This game was made for the Hell Yeah Poetry! Jam

CONTROLS:

WASD/ Arrow Keys to move around, Bump into objects to interact with them.

Credits:

Writing and Designs: coolcandies

Music: Kevin Mac Leod

Extra Help: ParanoidHawk

There are 2 endings in this game and unique poems/dialogue for the routes! 

All poetry is written by me, there's some haikus, some normal rhyming poems, and other weird bits of text scattered around here. 

This game was made in a weekend using bitsy,  and it's my first ever game :D! I just really wanted to enter a game jam and after seeing others using bitsy i decided to try it out!
